import React, {useState, Component } from "react"; import {Modal, Button} from "react-bootstrap" function PerscribedMed (props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const handleCloseAndBuy= () => { setShow(false); alert("Prescription Has Been Sent!"); } return (

Please note that shipping times are not based on the time of payment of your prescription. Shipping times will take effect after your order has been processed and dispensed by the pharmacy.
